current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to ensure
		  that the South Texas Department of Veterans Affairs Health Care Center at
		  Harlingen, located in Harlingen, Texas, includes a full-service inpatient
		  health care facility of the Department of Veterans Affairs, to redesignate such
		  center, and for other purposes.

text.#text: According to the

quote.#tail: of the annual budget request for the
Garza, a veteran who served in the

text.#text: Arturo

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, rose to
			 the rank of Sergeant, and served two tours in the Vietnam War, passed away on
			 October 3, 2012.

text.#text:
Treto Garza, who
			 was also a former co-chairman of the Veterans Alliance of the Rio Grande
			 Valley, tirelessly fought to improve health care services for veterans in the
			 Rio Grande Valley, with his efforts successfully leading to the creation of the
			 South Texas VA Health Care Center at Harlingen, located in Harlingen,
			 Texas.
